movies.title: Bad Johnson
movies.plot: A charismatic womanizer receives his comeuppance after his penis mysteriously leaves his body and takes human form.
movies.simplePlot: A charismatic womanizer receives his comeuppance after his penis mysteriously leaves his body and takes human form.

biography.bio: Jamie Chung was born and raised in California, the daughter of Korean parents. She studied Economics at the University of California, Riverside. Chung's break came in 2004, when she was working in a sports bar. MTV held auditions for Real World (1992) there, she tried out, and was successful, appearing in the San Diego based fourteenth season. Chung went on to successfully launched an acting career, making her debut with a small part in Veronica Mars (2004). Roles in other TV series followed, including Days of Our Lives (1965) and Greek (2007). She also transitioned into feature films with such projects as Sorority Row (2009), Sucker Punch (2011) and The Hangover Part II (2011).
biography.name: Jamie Chung

biography.bio: Katherine Cunningham was born and raised in Elk Grove Village IL. As a child she joined her parents and siblings on stage, entertaining audiences in a variety of local theatrical productions. After studying acting and biology at Illinois State University she began an acting career in theatre. She has worked on various productions including but not limited to Picnic (Writers' Theatre), Honest (Steppenwolf Theatre), The Taming of the Shrew (Chicago Shakespeare Theatre) and the world premier Big Lake Big City (Lookingglass Theatre) written by Keith Huff, directed by David Schwimmer. She made her television debut in "Detroit 1-8-7" (ABC) where she played a black jack dealing confidant to a womanizing police officer. Other television credits include guest spots on "Shameless" (Showtime), "The Playboy Club" (NBC), "The Mob Doctor" (FOX), "Underemployed" (MTV), "Chicago Fire" (NBC) and "Mind Games"(ABC)
biography.name: Katherine Cunningham

biography.bio: Cam graduated from Auburn High School in Auburn, Washington in 2001. His family lives in Lake Tapps, WA. His father's name is Jay, mother's name is Kim and he has one older sister, Kelsie. His father is one of the founders of a popular restaurant chain called The Rock, Wood Fired Pizza & Spirits. Cam resides in West Hollywood, California.
biography.name: Cam Gigandet

biography.bio: Nick Thune was born in Seattle and lived there until he was 24, when he moved to Los Angeles to pursue his comedy career. He has been getting steadily more popular over the past few years, appearing at the Laugh Factory, on Letterman and in several short comedy films. He has also had cameo appearances in several major films, including Knocked Up.
biography.name: Nick Thune

biography.bio: George Lako is an actor and filmmaker of Greek and Albanian decent. Born in Europe he came to the states at the age of 5. His acting career started young, creating videos mimicking his favorite films with his brother Steve. He graduated with high honors from the University of Illinois at Chicago and decided to make the move to Los Angeles to further his life long passion. However, George is not just an actor - He takes a broad interest in all aspects of filmmaking and has created a foundation, along with Scott Myers, called #MAKEFILMCAMPAIGN. This campaign was started to help children with disabilities create films through their unique visions. George can be seen on network shows as well as action packed series playing a diverse range of roles.
biography.name: George Lako

biography.bio: Rammel Chan is an actor, known for The End of the Tour (2015), Bad Johnson (2014) and Crisis (2014).
biography.name: Rammel Chan

biography.bio: Holly Houk is an actress and producer, known for Lifestone Velocity (2017), Beauty Queen Murders (2013) and Unusual Suspects (2010).
biography.name: Holly Houk

biography.bio: Casey Tutton is an actress, known for The Poker House (2008), The Swing (2007) and Gifted Hands: The Ben Carson Story (2009).
biography.name: Casey Tutton

biography.bio: Katie Rich is a writer and actress, known for Saturday Night Live (1975), Saturday Night Live: Best of This Season (2014) and 15 Minutes to Obscurity.
biography.name: Katie Rich

biography.bio: Jessica Joy was born on October 4, 1978 in Olmsted Falls, Ohio, USA. She is an actress, known for Bad Johnson (2014), My Life Is a Joke (2013) and The Playboy Club (2011).
biography.name: Jessica Joy

biography.bio: Kevin grew up in Glenview, Illinois, a northern suburb of Chicago. After graduating from Glenbrook South High School he attended The University of Illinois where he received his acting training. Upon graduation he returned to Chicago to study at the Second City Conservatory and signed with Grossman Jack Talent. Kevin continues to call Chicago home.
biography.name: Kevin Miller

biography.bio: Emily Tumen is an actress, known for Bad Johnson (2014), Train Town (2007) and Goodnight to the Lightning (2014).
biography.name: Emily Tumen

biography.bio: Meg Thalken was born on September 30, 1954 in Washington, District of Columbia, USA as Margaret A Thalken. She is an actress, known for U.S. Marshals (1998), Poltergeist III (1988) and A Family Thing (1996).
biography.name: Meg Thalken

biography.bio: Danny Rhodes is a Chicago based actor, writer, director and producer. Rhodes began his acting career in the theater while earning his Bachelor's Degree with a concentration in film from Columbia College Chicago. After graduation Rhodes made his feature film debut with a small role in "Stranger Than Fiction" and has since landed roles in several independent films including "Hohokam," "Blackmail Boys," "Audrey the Trainwreck," and "Nate & Margaret." He made his writing and producing debut with the TV series "Bad Sides," in which Rhodes also starred in the hilarious role of Marcuss, a spoiled, trust-fund baby with aspirations of being a filmmaker who makes ridiculous demands on his staff and the actors who audition for him. His other television work includes roles on the TV series "Detroit 1-8-7," and the upcoming "Chicago Fire." A true horror film fan at heart, Rhodes had a small role as a deranged uncle with too much love for his niece in the film "House of Purgatory." He then wrote and directed the horror short "He Ain't Heavy," a film about two brothers who won't let anyone get in between their relationship, which he will join with five to six additional shorts in the horror compilation "I Scream, You Scream" in the vein of a modern day "Creepshow." Rhodes recently formed his own production company, Rhodesclosed Productions, and will join Willow Road Entertainment to make his feature film directorial debut with "Released," set to begin filming in 2013. Willow Road Entertainment has also teamed up with Rhodes on "I Scream, You Scream".
biography.name: Danny Rhodes

biography.bio: Al Marchesi was born on April 10, 1976 in Chicago, Illinois, USA. He is known for his work on The Dark Knight (2008), Bender (2017) and Delilah (2010).
biography.name: Al Marchesi
